html:
2026-0049
2026-01-30ESDC, TC, ISC, NRCANCanada Labour CodeRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code in order to (1) establish new regulatory requirements for exposure to engineered nanomaterials, thermal stress, non-solar ultraviolet radiation and radon; (2) provide an approach for situations where exposure threshold limits have not been established; (3) update references to incorporated standards; (4) harmonize record keeping requirements; (5) clarify air sampling requirements; and (6) make consequential amendments to the Administrative Monetary Penalties (Canada Labour Code) Regulations to ensure enforcement of health and safety provisions under Part IV of the Code.Registration: SOR/2026-0010 Publication Date: 2026-02-11
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code
precis: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code in order to (1) establish new regulatory requirements for exposure to engineered nanomaterials, thermal stress, non-solar ultraviolet radiation and radon; (2) provide an approach for situations where exposure threshold limits have not been established; (3) update references to incorporated standards; (4) harmonize record keeping requirements; (5) clarify air sampling requirements; and (6) make consequential amendments to the Administrative Monetary Penalties (Canada Labour Code) Regulations to ensure enforcement of health and safety provisions under Part IV of the Code.
